item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1854; 09:55PM; 1129 W 43rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CB3j9W; Vermont Square; KNOCKDOWN: 20 firefighters extinguished the fire in 23 minutes with no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E215 E46 RA15 RA246 T15; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1867; 09:53PM; 2927 N Minto Ct; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vSmWqe; El Sereno; KNOCKDOWN: 24 firefighters extinguished the fire in 16 minutes with no injuries reported. One occupant was rescued out of the small structure by firefighters and sustained no injuries. No other structures were damaged. No further details.; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E16 E201 E203 E212 E47 RA12 RA47 T1 T12 T3; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Update Technical Rescue; INC#1763; 09:43PM; 2154 N Beech Knoll Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ix5Wxr; Hollywood Hills West; Two homes are impacted but are not damaged. LAFD Urban Search and Rescue Task Force will remain on scene. Geologists from the LA Department of Building and Safety Grading Division will respond for a full evaluation of the hillside. There are no injuries and it is currently a static situation. No further details and no further updates anticipated.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 BC9 E108 E237 E289 E89 EM14 HR3 RA3 RA76 RA89 SC1 T37 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1867; 09:37PM; 2927 N Minto Ct; MAP: https://bit.ly/3vSmWqe; El Sereno; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing and at least one additional building exposed. One additional task force requested. ; FS 47; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E16 E201 E212 RA12 T1 T12; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1854; 09:32PM; 1129 W 43rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CB3j9W; Vermont Square; Two story four-plex (vacant) with fire showing from one window on the first floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. There are no other structures exposed.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E215 E46 RA246 T15; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Technical Rescue ; INC#1763; 09:28PM; 2154 N Beech Knoll Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ix5Wxr; Hollywood Hills West; Approximately 1/4 acre of hillside sluffed off. There are four homes which are in the path but not currently threatened. However, the potential exists. Firefighters are investigating the situation and Urban Search and Rescue technical experts are enroute. No further details at this time.; FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E108; CH8; Margaret Stewart

Update Traffic; INC#1464; 08:48PM; 11414 Iverson Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Zm0CCZ; Chatsworth; The large sink hole is fully cutting across the southbound lane of Iverson Road. The entire road is compromised. There were a total of four patients trapped in the sink hole. Two patients self-extricated, uninjured, prior to LAFD arrival. Firefighters then secured the vehicles to limit shifting, which had already occurred twice. The road was continuing to sluff and deteriorate, necessitating an immediate rescue to save their lives. Firefighters conducted a high angle rope rescue operation, using the aerial ladder, and safely extricated both patients. They were treated and transported with minor injuries. The incident will be transitioning to law enforcement for full road closure and the appropriate City agencies can evaluate and safely remove the vehicles to being road repairs. No further details and no further updates anticipated. ; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E106 E107 E28 E289 E296 E88 E89 EM15 HR3 PI1 RA106 RA72 SC1 SW88 T89 T96 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Traffic - SINK HOLE; INC#1464; 08:31PM; 11414 Iverson Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Zm0CCZ; Chatsworth; Both patients have been safely extricated from the sink hole and are being transported to the hospital with minor, non-life threatening injuries. ; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E106 E107 E28 E289 E296 E88 E89 EM15 HR3 PI1 RA106 RA72 SC1 SW88 T89 T96 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Traffic - SINK HOLE; INC#1464; 07:52PM; 11414 Iverson Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Zm0CCZ; Chatsworth; The road is completely compromised and unpassable to traffic nor is it able to support emergency vehicles. Firefighters slid ladders down to the two patients working to self-extricate out of their vehicles in the hole. It is unclear if there are any additional patients at this time. All drivers are advised to avoid the area (Iverson Rd between the 118 Freeway and La Quilla Dr. LAPD Inc# 3119; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E106 E107 E28 E289 E296 E88 E89 EM15 HR3 RA106 RA72 SC1 SW88 T89 T96 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - SINK HOLE; INC#1464; 07:20PM; 11414 Iverson Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Zm0CCZ; Chatsworth; Two cars into a sinkhole with one on top of the other. There are two patients inside vehicle and they are working to self-extricate at this time. No further details.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E106 E107 E28 E289 E296 E88 E89 EM15 HR3 RA106 RA72 SC1 SW88 T89 T96 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart
